verses.verse: And Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto Moses <S%H4872><s%>, See <S%H7200><s%>, I have made <S%H5414><s%> thee as God <S%H430><s%> to Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%>; and Aaron <S%H175><s%> thy brother <S%H251><s%> shall be thy prophet <S%H5030><s%>.

Thou shalt speak <S%H1696><s%> all that I command <S%H6680><s%> thee <S%H175><s%>; and Aaron thy brother <S%H251><s%> shall speak <S%H1696><s%> unto Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%>, that he let <S%H7971><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> go out of his land <S%H776><s%>.

And I will harden <S%H7185><s%> Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%>'s heart <S%H3820><s%>, and multiply <S%H7235><s%> my signs <S%H226><s%> and my wonders <S%H4159><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>.

But Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> will not hearken <S%H8085><s%> unto you <S%H5414><s%>, and I will lay my hand <S%H3027><s%> upon Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, and bring forth <S%H3318><s%> my hosts <S%H6635><s%>, my people <S%H5971><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, out of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> by great <S%H1419><s%> judgments <S%H8201><s%>.

And the Egyptians <S%H4714><s%> shall know <S%H3045><s%> that I am Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, when I stretch forth <S%H5186><s%> my hand <S%H3027><s%> upon Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, and bring out <S%H3318><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> from among them <S%H8432><s%>.
And Moses <S%H4872><s%> and Aaron <S%H175><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> so <S%H3068><s%>; as Jehovah commanded <S%H6680><s%> them <S%H6213><s%>, so did they.

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> was fourscore <S%H8084><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H1121><s%>, and Aaron <S%H175><s%> fourscore <S%H8084><s%> and three <S%H7969><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H1121><s%>, when they spake <S%H1696><s%> unto Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%>.
And Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> spake <S%H559><s%> unto Moses <S%H4872><s%> and unto Aaron <S%H175><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>,

When Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> shall speak <S%H1696><s%> unto you <S%H559><s%>, saying, Show <S%H5414><s%> a wonder <S%H4159><s%> for you <S%H559><s%>; then thou shalt say unto Aaron <S%H175><s%>, Take <S%H3947><s%> thy rod <S%H4294><s%>, and cast <S%H7993><s%> it down before <S%H6440><s%> Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%>, that it become a serpent <S%H8577><s%>.

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> and Aaron <S%H175><s%> went in <S%H935><s%> unto Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%>, and they did <S%H6213><s%> so <S%H3068><s%>, as Jehovah had commanded <S%H6680><s%>: and Aaron <S%H175><s%> cast down <S%H7993><s%> his rod <S%H4294><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> and before <S%H6440><s%> his servants <S%H5650><s%>, and it became a serpent <S%H8577><s%>.

Then Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> also called <S%H7121><s%> for the wise men <S%H2450><s%> and the sorcerers <S%H3784><s%>: and they also <S%H2748><s%>, the magicians of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, did <S%H6213><s%> in like manner <S%H3651><s%> with their enchantments <S%H3858><s%>.

For they cast down <S%H7993><s%> every man <S%H376><s%> his rod <S%H4294><s%>, and they became serpents <S%H8577><s%>: but Aaron <S%H175><s%>'s rod <S%H4294><s%> swallowed up <S%H1104><s%> their rods <S%H4294><s%>.
And Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%>'s heart <S%H3820><s%> was hardened <S%H2388><s%>, and he hearkened <S%H8085><s%> not unto them <S%H3068><s%>; as Jehovah had spoken <S%H1696><s%>.

And Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto Moses <S%H4872><s%>, Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%>'s heart <S%H3820><s%> is stubborn <S%H3515><s%>, he refuseth <S%H3985><s%> to let the people <S%H5971><s%> go <S%H7971><s%>.

Get <S%H3212><s%> thee unto Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> in the morning <S%H1242><s%>; lo <S%H3318><s%>, he goeth out unto the water <S%H4325><s%>; and thou shalt stand <S%H5324><s%> by the river <S%H2975><s%>'s brink <S%H8193><s%> to meet <S%H7125><s%> him <S%H4294><s%>; and the rod which was turned <S%H2015><s%> to a serpent <S%H5175><s%> shalt thou take <S%H3947><s%> in thy hand <S%H3027><s%>.

And thou shalt say <S%H559><s%> unto him <S%H3068><s%>, Jehovah, the God <S%H430><s%> of the Hebrews <S%H5680><s%>, hath sent <S%H7971><s%> me unto thee <S%H559><s%>, saying, Let my people <S%H5971><s%> go <S%H7971><s%>, that they may serve <S%H5647><s%> me in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%>: and <S%H3541><s%>, behold, hitherto thou hast not hearkened <S%H8085><s%>.

Thus saith <S%H559><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, In this thou shalt know <S%H3045><s%> that I am Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>: behold <S%H5221><s%>, I will smite with the rod <S%H4294><s%> that is in my hand <S%H3027><s%> upon the waters <S%H4325><s%> which are in the river <S%H2975><s%>, and they shall be turned <S%H2015><s%> to blood <S%H1818><s%>.

And the fish <S%H1710><s%> that are in the river <S%H2975><s%> shall die <S%H4191><s%>, and the river <S%H2975><s%> shall become foul <S%H887><s%>; and the Egyptians <S%H4714><s%> shall loathe <S%H3811><s%> to drink <S%H8354><s%> water <S%H4325><s%> from the river <S%H2975><s%>.

And Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto Moses <S%H4872><s%>, Say unto Aaron <S%H175><s%>, Take <S%H3947><s%> thy rod <S%H4294><s%>, and stretch out <S%H5186><s%> thy hand <S%H3027><s%> over the waters <S%H4325><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, over their rivers <S%H2975><s%>, over their streams <S%H5104><s%>, and over their pools <S%H4723><s%>, and over all their ponds <S%H98><s%> of water <S%H4325><s%>, that they may become blood <S%H1818><s%>; and there shall be blood <S%H1818><s%> throughout all the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, both in vessels of wood <S%H6086><s%> and in vessels of stone <S%H68><s%>.

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> and Aaron <S%H175><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> so <S%H3068><s%>, as Jehovah commanded <S%H6680><s%>; and he lifted up <S%H7311><s%> the rod <S%H4294><s%>, and smote <S%H5221><s%> the waters <S%H4325><s%> that were in the river <S%H2975><s%>, in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%>, and in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of his servants <S%H5650><s%>; and all the waters <S%H4325><s%> that were in the river <S%H2975><s%> were turned <S%H2015><s%> to blood <S%H1818><s%>.

And the fish <S%H1710><s%> that were in the river <S%H2975><s%> died <S%H4191><s%>; and the river <S%H2975><s%> became foul <S%H887><s%>, and the Egyptians <S%H4714><s%> could <S%H3201><s%> not drink <S%H8354><s%> water <S%H4325><s%> from the river <S%H2975><s%>; and the blood <S%H1818><s%> was throughout all the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>.

And the magicians <S%H2748><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> in like manner with their enchantments <S%H3909><s%>: and Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%>'s heart <S%H3820><s%> was hardened <S%H2388><s%>, and he hearkened <S%H8085><s%> not unto them <S%H3068><s%>; as Jehovah had spoken <S%H1696><s%>.
And Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> turned <S%H6437><s%> and went <S%H935><s%> into his house <S%H1004><s%>, neither did he lay <S%H7896><s%> even this <S%H2063><s%> to heart <S%H3820><s%>.

And all the Egyptians <S%H4714><s%> digged <S%H2658><s%> round about <S%H5439><s%> the river <S%H2975><s%> for water <S%H4325><s%> to drink <S%H8354><s%>; for they could <S%H3201><s%> not drink <S%H8354><s%> of the water <S%H4325><s%> of the river <S%H2975><s%>.
And seven <S%H7651><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> were fulfilled <S%H4390><s%>, after <S%H310><s%> that Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> had smitten <S%H5221><s%> the river <S%H2975><s%>.
